data.title: Terokai Moscow
data.meta_description: Penjimatan besar untuk hotel terbaik di Moscow. Lihat reviu dan cari harga terbaik yang dijamin untuk semua bajet.
data.text:
Matreshka Hotel

Purata skor reviu: 7.4

Located 5 minutes’ walk from the Bolshoi Theatre and TSUM Shopping Centre and 10 minutes’ walk from the Kremlin, this hotel in the heart of Moscow features free Wi-Fi and a snack bar.

“Friendly and attentive staff! I stayed in a fun mezzanine-type room, which was a positive surprise. The staff was great: I misplaced my wallet in the lounge by the reception and when I noted this and returned to the hotel, in panic of course, the staff handed me my wallet – untouched.”

Aeropolis Hotel

Purata skor reviu: 7.8

A 10-minute walk from Dinamo Metro Station, Aeropolis Hotel offers panoramic views of Moscow and free WiFi. Private parking is provided on site.

“Everything is perfect. First download app for taxi its cheaper and the metro so cheap. We arrived early on 7am and we were about to get in to the room on 2pm but there was empty room so I paid little more and I went to a room and on 2pm I went to our room. Even the staff who didn't know that much English they tried to help us a lot. Location is so crazy and good. The Metro is 10 min away... The supermarket is 5 min walk and there is big mall in 15 min walking... Bus stop is near every is perfect. I stayed there 1 day and for my next 3 day I will write again.”

SunFlower Park Hotel

Purata skor reviu: 8.4

Hotel yang bertaraf 4 bintang ini menawarkan Wi-Fi percuma, tempat letak kereta percuma dan bilik-bilik yang luas dengan bar mini percuma.

“Everything was perfect in a way. For that price, it was more than I expected. My first impression when I saw it, wasn't that good because I saw some people smoking in front of the door and bla bla bla, but after I saw the whole, yeah I must have to say that it's great place to spend the night.”

Hotel Complex Orekhovo

Purata skor reviu: 8.1

Pangsapuri yang tenang dan layan-diri serta menawarkan pemandangan hebat ke Tsaritsyno Palace, hotel di Moscow ini hanyalah 100 meter dari Stesen Metro Orekhovo.

“The hotel is 35 minutes by car from the airport. The hotel is very clean and tidy with fresh flowers placed in the bar and reception daily. Breakfast is included in the price and there is a good selection of delicious food every morning. The hotel also serves lunch and dinner which costs £5 per person. The bar serves snacks all day. Our room was spotlessly clean and tidy and we had our own kitchen and bathroom. The hotel staff are kind and friendly and work hard to maintain their high standards of service.”

Warsaw Hotel

Purata skor reviu: 7.9

Pemandangan panoramik pusat bandar Moscow boleh didapati di semua bilik di hotel bertaraf 3 bintang ini, 3 minit berjalan kaki dari Gorky Park.

“The location is just perfect. Very very close to the metro, close to cafeterias (there is one that you can access through the hotel premises), about 300 yards from a supermarket, and very close also to different restaurants (a Japanese one across the street is an excellent option with a very good price). Staff has very good English and fulfilled our expectations. Rooms are large and mattresses are very good. The wifi is ok. Also in each floor you have hot water for a tea or soup. The breakfast cafeteria is in a top floor, so the view is very nice. Of course, the heating is a pleasure as in most hotels in Russia. Definitely a hotel to recommend in his price range, specially because its wonderful location.”

Luxury Hostel

Purata skor reviu: 8.1

Offering a children's playground and views of the city, Luxury Hostel is located in Moscow. A flat-screen TV is offered. You will find a 24-hour front desk and hairdresser's at the property.

“Very helpful, approachable and efficient staff. I requested to be met at the airport: a hostel representative took me from the airport right to the door of my room for a very reasonable price. I had some problems withdrawing money from several cash machines - again, a hostel representative took me in his car to several banks until I was able to get the money. Generally, this hostel is very clean and comfortable. Only 15 min away from central Moscow by Metro; Metro station is a few minutes away. I had a great stay.”

Design Hotel (D'Hotel)

Purata skor reviu: 8.6

This 10-storey building houses a comfortable hotel in Moscow's business district, with the nearest metro station just a short walk away.

“This is a genuine review detailed as possible.I emailed the property before arrival and they answered very promptly and satisfy my request for the room.The hotel is nearby VDKH metro 800 meters 5 minutes walking distance, in a quiet residential block.The entrance of the hotel can be tricky in first but it has easy access from Raketnyy ulitsa.There are also some supermarkets and pharmacy shops nearby. Hotel reception staff is very friendly and speaking fluently English , you can ask them literally anything and they will help if they can.The hotel has no awkward security staff but the level of security is high as you can only access rooms if you have an electronic key,there is security but it monitors from cameras.The rooms are very comfortable ,clean,actually they change the towels 2 times per day, they offer toothbrush, soap,shaving kit,hairdryer.the beds are comfortable , air-conditioning and ventilation are super and control-able. the hotel must have been newly renovated as all in rooms are new and European style.The breakfast is located on 2nt floor in a cosy restaurant.Its pretty much same every day but it contains, chicken saute (breast strips),green peas(boiled),sausages (chipolatas) boiled,egg putting(Russian style) ,crepes or pancakes , variation of fruits(seasonal) some pastry , honey , marmalade , fresh butter smintana,mayonnaise,some kind of cereal,hard boiled eggs,2 kind of cakes , Pullman bread to toast on demand,Fruit yogurt,Black coffee,Variety of Tea,2 kinds of Juice.Generally i would recommend this hotel to all travelers as it combines easy metro access, value for money , cleanness,friendly stuff and full comfort.i will 100% return to this hotel as i am fully satisfied from quality of service.”

ICON Hostel

Purata skor reviu: 9.3

Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, ICON Hostel is situated in Moscow, 3.3 km from Arbat Street. Every room at this hostel is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV.

“Just everything. There is nothing that i can criticize. Warmful welcoming, everything is clean, real breakfast, surroundings are insanely beautiful. Apart that, you will also be able to get friends, find people with the same interests as you. If you're unsociable, you can just also isolate yourself in your room. The girls (hosts) will always try to help, if you need. When i arrived the first night, i was welcomed with a piece of cake and white wine, i was lucky, just to say if they had cake, they will gave you one ! ;) Wish all the best to the team and see you next year !”

Brighton

Purata skor reviu: 8.8

Terletak bersebelahan Petrovskiy Park, Hotel Brighton menawarkan sebuah kolam renang dalaman, sauna dan Wifi percuma.

“i came to Moscow for weekend and was hoping that i will enjoy it and relax from the hard week i had before and this hotel provided it for me. This is a calm and quite place few minutes away from the center. Staff always professional and friendly. I didn't get a chance to visit SPA, because my stay was too short and i had absolutely no time for it, but next time i will come and return only to this hotel and try it :)”

City Comfort Hotel

Purata skor reviu: 7.8

This hotel is set in the heart of Moscow, in the old Kitay Gorod District, just a 5-minute walk from the Lubyanka Square. Free Wi-Fi is provided at City Comfort Hotel.

“it was in a fantastic location with lots of restaurants nearby (the georgian restaurant was yummyyy!) and the metro as well. you could also walk to the kremlin from there and be in the middle of the beautiful city. the staff was fantastic, going out of the way to accomodate one of our friends who had arrived many hours before the official check in. they also helped us when we needed to print something and overall, was very friendly at all times.”

Fasol Hostel

Purata skor reviu: 9.4

Fasol Hostel is located in the Basmanny district in Moscow, 1.2 km from Bolshoi Theatre and 1.3 km from GUM Department Store. Free private parking is available on site.

“Amazing hostel! I could say the best I've been to in my life! The staff is super helpful and make you feel at home! The facilities are new, clean, comfortable and spacious! The location so central and safe... Many nice cafes and restaurants are nearby and the metro just 5 minutes walk! They also organize many free tours around the city or museums and some gatherings in the evening to cook dinner,play cards, drink etc. Sometimes you feel like you are in a hotel as they make your bed when you arrive and provide tooth brush and towels! Absolutely recommended for anybody!”

Panorama City

Purata skor reviu: 8.4

Located in the Presnensky district in Moscow, a 5-minute walk from Expocentre, Panorama City features air-conditioned rooms and private parking. Each room has a flat-screen TV with cable channels.

“Don't be surprised, it's not a regular type of hotel !!! With its entrance etc. It's Not. Properly located inside of Emperia Tower, one of the dazzling towers of "Moscow City" complex. "Hotel" comprises of 7 rooms co-located on the same floor with several business offices. However, it's not presenting any discomfort or unconvince. Hotel rooms are on the small size, except one which is corner larger room. Perfect size for single travellers. Amazing view from 48th floor over Moscow takes your breath away. When I stayed Internet was not super stable. Prepare to rely on your own phone. Breakfast was great. Fresh home made stuff! Yumm. Pleasant and helpful staff. Small inconvenience, when you returning back to the building you need to go see downstairs tower attendant for entry pass card EVERY TIME you enter the building. But, if you gone all day it's not a big deal. There is a huge Mall called Afimal right next to it. With truckloads of designer stores with typical Moscow high prices and on other hand with bunch of very reasonably priced great restaurants.”

Master Hotel Pervomayskaya

Purata skor reviu: 7.5

This hotel is located in Moscow, a 15-minute walk from Izmaylovsky Park. A sauna, massage services, a beauty salon and a 24-hour reception are featured at Master Hotel on Pervomayskaya.

“,clean very very clean, plus they clean rooms every day....peoples who work in hotel r great....Nadya, Alexsei....all of them help me so much. They receive for me cage for dog which s send with courir....we cam in 4 am they give to us room to we sleep until our room be ready .....realy i not have words....totally amazing place where u can feel like u cam home....internet connection was good, central heater work good....”

Tsaritsino Apart-Hotel

Purata skor reviu: 7.8

This hotel in Moscow offers panoramic views of Tsaritsino Park and is just a 15-minute drive from Domodedovo Airport. It offers a relaxing spa and apartments with a balcony.

“The hotel is close to a metro station which very convenient. Although it is situated at a major street my room was quiet (good windows). The room (single) was rather a small appartment then a typical hotel room (equipped with kitchen, fridge). Free WIFi available. You probably will not choose this one for honeymoon but if you are looking for an affordable place to stay in the South of Moscow that's a good choice.”

Ampir Belorusskaya Hotel

Purata skor reviu: 7.9

Conveniently close to Belorusskaya Metro Station, this hotel offers rooms and suites in a classic building. Benefit from a free WiFi connection.

“I often go in Moscow for my job and finnaly I find the hotel where I will always come back. It is like to have find a kind of personal house. Great position ( near the Belorusskaya station where aereoexpress arrives directly from Sheremeteyvo) and staff always extrelmly helpfull and kind! Around the hotel there are a lot of restaurant, bar and with a good and interesting walk Cremlin, Red Square, Bolshoj are near. Price is very good, room clean. Moscow is a great town.”

Yum-Yum Hostel

Purata skor reviu: 8.3

Yum-Yum Hostel is located in Moscow, a 7-minute walk of Baumanskaya and Krasnoselskaya Metro Stations. Kazansky, Leningradsky and Yaroslavsky Train Stations are within a 15-minute walk.

“I have come very late, but administrators were very supportive and smile. He showed me all the capacities and accepted order for breakfast. In spite of the fact, that it was too late. In the morning breakfast and taxi were waiting for me for agreed time. The size of the room is not huge. But the air in the room was fresh. And it was clean. I really enjoyed with common area.”

Derzhavnaya Hotel

Purata skor reviu: 8.8

This Moscow hotel offers free Wi-Fi, and massage facilities. Central Moscow and Red Square are less than 15 minutes away by metro.

“The hotel is 5 minutes walk from Metro VDNKh with buses and monorail too. In a leafy street next to an attractive park, it also has a cafe (Sonata) where a generous buffet breakfast is served and where dinner can be ordered. The staff are friendly and efficient, with some English spoken. Bedroom and bathroom both comfortable and spotless. The bathroom has a shower and bathtub with brand new fittings and plenty of hot water. Kettle and fridge in the room. 24-hour security desk. Excellent value in a well-run business-class hotel.”

Kyznetskiy Inn Hotel

Purata skor reviu: 8.7

This hotel is set in the heart of Moscow, just a 2-minute walk from the Bolshoi Theatre. Free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour front desk are featured at Kuznetsky Inn.

“We loved everything! The hotel is located in the Bolshoi Theatre area which is very central (you can easily walk to the Kremlin and Red Square). Also, there are lots of restaurants and shops nearby. Breakfast included was good and the room was very comfortable (towels were changed everyday). Staff was nice and helpful. Wifi had a very good signal!”

Altay Econom Hotel

Purata skor reviu: 7.4

This hotel is located in the north of Moscow, a 2-minute walk from the Botanical Garden. A 24-hour reception is available at Altay Econom Hotel. Free WiFi is available at the lobby.

“The price was really reasonable for the amenities that was provided in the hotel. The room was clean, spacious and cosy. The reception areas in the buildings are nice too with vending machines and good wifi. The staff were as helpful as could be considering the language barrier.”
